carpet.rule.renewableCalcite.desc: Allows you to use bonemeal on cobblestone to get calcite
carpet.rule.warmSheep.desc: Sheep does not freeze in powder snow
carpet.rule.plantableWitherRoseOnNetherB: Wither roses can be planted on nether bricks
carpet.rule.autoTrade.desc: with dispenser + emerald/diamond block being placed nearby, villagers will automatically trade with it, it uses redstone signal to get trade index
carpet.rule.autoTradeLimit.desc: If enabled, auto trade will be limited normally as if the player was trading with the villager
